body:
MaybeReduceResult MaglevGraphBuilder::TryBuildNamedAccess(
    ValueNode* receiver, ValueNode* lookup_start_object,
    compiler::NamedAccessFeedback const& feedback,
    compiler::FeedbackSource const& feedback_source,
    compiler::AccessMode access_mode,
    GenericAccessFunc&& build_generic_access) { ... }

This builder routine implements lowering of IC-based named property access using feedback (monomorphic/polymorphic/megamorphic). It collects inferred maps from feedback or known_node_aspects, builds PropertyAccessInfo via AccessInfoFactory, emits map checks (BuildCheckMaps/CheckMapsWithMigration) and then calls TryBuildPropertyAccess or TryBuildPolymorphicPropertyAccess. It chooses fast-paths for string/number maps, in-place double field stores vs Float64ToHeapNumberForField when transitioning.
explanation: Core named-access lowering entrypoint in maglev/maglev-graph-builder.cc. Key to understanding how feedback drives monomorphic/polymorphic/mode decisions, and where CheckMaps and StoreMap/transition logic are emitted. Contains the logic that selects BuildLoadField/TryBuildStoreField paths.
